name: Bit-Depth
description:
Description

Bit-Depth is an arcade style shooter developed by Mikey Bess for the SGDA Arcade Jam. You play as a raccoon whose main goal is to shoot all of his enemies and get the highest score possible while upgrading his revolver along the way.

Controls
  • W A S D - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse - Shoot and Menu Interaction
  • Enter/Start - Begin the game
  • Z (During title screen) - Wipe high scores
Content

14 Weapon upgrades (Choice between two options every 10 waves)

3 Enemy types with 3 variants each

Combo system that multiplies score and affects the bit-depth and shaders of the game

High score system (Does NOT work in web build, when you die press enter to go back to the title screen)
